Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #71 buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial. 

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to utility maintenance at Commercial/103rd.

Headline: #87 87th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 87th/Aberdeen
ShortDescription: Eastbound 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87h/Racine, 87th/Halsted and 87th due to fire department activity near 87th/ Aberdeen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87h/Racine, 87th/Halsted and 87th due to fire department activity near 87th/ Aberdeen.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
